text: Pickup location for KKKL Bus bound to Kuala Lumpur, there are a lot food options, has McDonald, and several restaurants near by, we were looking for currency exchange but was not able to find one. Find Uncle operator for confirmation and other instructions, he has a placard
if you are looking for KKKL bus, can directly search KKKL Kovan on Google maps. Btw, this is the correct place, the bus and the operator uncle will call you soon. He can sense you are taking the bus.

This is the terminal for buses to melaka, kl, and more. If you were also confused by the 0 info that the bus operators give on the exact location, you're not the only one.

The guy who directed me to the melaka bus didn't have any signs too (he can just kinda tell that you're going to Msia).
Good bus stop located in Former Bus Interchange, service 53M and 115 are able to use old sawtooth berths. Boarding Area also has seats for commuters to rest on while waiting for their bus

Formerly Hougang South Bus Interchange was closed since 2004. Services are relocated to Hougang Central Bus Interchange.

Currently it now it serve as bus stop for some services, public carpark and private bus terminal for express buses.
